General.Name: Karsten S.A
General.Description: Karsten S.A. manufactures and sells home textiles lines and decor products in Brazil. The company offers bed, table, bath, infant, and other decor products. It also provides house and decoration products, such as home fragrances, picture frame, robe, decorative pillows and cushions, mats, organizer and clothes basket, and kitchen and bathroom accessories; and Karsten Decor fabrics, including Tramé, aquablock/waterproof, art décor, marble, and wall décor/wall fabrics, as well as fabric craft products. The company was founded in 1882 and is headquartered in Blumenau, Brazil. Karsten S.A. is a subsidiary of Kasavii Participações S.A.
General.Address: Rua Johann Karsten, No. 260, Blumenau, SC, Brazil, 89074-700
